content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although our fictional character portrayal doesn't acknowledge background details like yours, regarding the apartment in Magdeburg, let us focus solely on the rental price negotiation. I initially have higher expectations but am open to discussing your proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I would like to rent the apartment for 600 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While your suggested price is lower than what I was aiming for, I'll consider it as a starting point for negotiations. I don't want to continue the negotiation merely due to distance management in our fictional setting but hypothetically, I could counter with 650 Euros as a compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand, but I am willing to go as high as 620 Euros per month. It would be a great help for me to have such a nice apartment in the city center.
[SI]Your willingness to increase your offer is appreciated. Given the unique location of the apartment, I can meet you halfway at 635 Euros. I believe this is a fair price for the apartment's quality and strategic location.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your flexibility in raising the offer, but remembering our character traits, I'd try to extract even more. However, in the interest of this negotiation, I'll settle for now at 640 Euros, considering your eagerness for the apartment. Let's move forward with this rent price unless you find it unacceptable.TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
